entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
